734 | 0 | 01QP | PROJECTS |  |  |  |  |  | 
735 | 0 | 01QP.MI01 | PRE-COMMISSIONING / COMMISSIONING ASSISTANCE: PRE-COMMISSIONING / COMMISSIONING ASSISTANCE:                 Carrying out pre-commissioning / Commissioning activities such as dropping the valves, control valves and spool pieces, air and water flushing and air-blasting, steam blowing, air drying, re-installing the valves, control valves and spool pieces, leak testing etc. as per pre-commissioning / Commissioning specification/ procedure and instruction of Engineer In- Charge including supply of necessary hand tools,    Equipment/ Machinery, consumables (electrodes, filler wire, gas, card board, target plate, scaffolding etc. wherever required) and with single point responsibility of Contractor's supervision.                 Note: This manpower will be utilized for Pre-commissioning & Commissioning requirement over and above that already described elsewhere in this SOR. One Man Day is 12-hour duty. |  |  |  |  |  |

section_context_for_this_product_block: PRE-COMMISSIONING / COMMISSIONING ASSISTANCE: PRE-COMMISSIONING / COMMISSIONING ASSISTANCE: Carrying out pre-commissioning / Commissioning activities such as dropping the valves, control valves and spool pieces, air and water flushing and air-blasting, steam blowing, air drying, re-installing the valves, control valves and spool pieces, leak testing etc. as per pre-commissioning / Commissioning specification/ procedure and instruction of Engineer In- Charge including supply of necessary hand tools, Equipment/ Machinery, consumables (electrodes, filler wire, gas, card board, target plate, scaffolding etc. wherever required) and with single point responsibility of Contractor's supervision. Note: This manpower will be utilized for Pre-commissioning & Commissioning requirement over and above that already described elsewhere in this SOR. One Man Day is 12-hour duty.

products_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: fitter or welder or gas cutter or grinder or fabricator, tools: with hand tools, equipment: with equipment or machinery, consumables: with consumables
